title: eravina sirige
sahitya:
eravina sirige bimmane beretare nIra kaDetaruNTe beNNe jIvave 
uragaLa heDeya neLala sErida kappe sthirakAla bALvude jIvave


caraNam 1    sati sutarendu neccalu bEDa manadloLu hitavarobbara kANe jIvave 
vrtA nInu keDa bEDa maraNavu tappadu dashakaNThagAdaru jIvave
    caraNam 2    Ase mADalu bEDa bhASe tappalu bEDanya strI sangavu bEDa jIvave 
EsEsu janmntara kaLaduLidaru I sAvu tappadu jIvave
    caraNam 3    Ane kudure mandi shAne bhaNDAravu Enu paDedarilla jIvave 
mAna saha sarva harige arpaNa mADi punItanAgiru jIvave
    caraNam 4    kereya kaTTisu matte bhUdODa hAkisu sereya biDisu puNya jIvave 
kareyade manege bandavarigannava nIDu paralOka sAdhana jIvave
    caraNam 5    satyavantara sangadoLage sarise mrtyu attattaliruvaLu jIvave 
satyavanta guru purandara viTTalalenne sattu huTTuvadilla jIvave
